{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3284233,"name":"Evan Sigl","username":"Legomonster33","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/legomonster33/{size}/234529_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-14T17:59:16.162Z","cooked":"

CyberMax1880×835 389 KB

Featuring:

  • 10-32 Nylock Nut insert Holes
  • Durable enough to survive the most vigorous of competitions
  • Easy remove of the controller for maintenance
  • Snug fit so you dont need any zipties or tape to keep your controllers locked in
  • Variable density for the toughest or lightest of applications
  • Fully 3d printable on any machine
  • Ultra clean surface finish to impress the judges
  • Excellent thermal dissipation
  • Integrated aerodynamic profile to keep your robot moving

Get yours today for only $499
Buy 2 and get a third one for only half the price!
